name: Call Me Phrasy!
description:
Prove you're the pun master in a game that is literally a play on words.

Call Me Phrasy! is a new word game where players read funny clues to solve pun puzzles. Get the first 50 pun puzzles FREE today!

Key Features
+ Solve 450 pun puzzles with over 1,350 clues!
+ Complete 9 categories with 45 sub-categories including topics like Viral Videos, Dogs, Cats, Foodies, Historical Baddies, & Classic Memes!
+ Cheat with your friends IN THE REAL WORLD without sending them spam!
+ Enhance your pun puzzle solving abilities by equipping a special helper like 1st Word Free, Show Vowels, or Keep Your Multiplier --- Don't spend a dime on boosts.
+ Collect trophies to prove you are THAT awesome.
+ Try to score high in every category!

-Note-
Contains 3rd party advertisements and in-app purchases of pun packs. Ads can be removed through a one-time in-app purchase.
